column1: 1533|3:33 PM|Jon stepped out of the Peugeot and headed inside the Shrine of the Book
column2: his heart throbbing a pulse he could feel down to his fingertips. A walk down the ramp brought him to the office of the director
column3: Dov Sonnenfeld. He looked at his watch: 3:33 PM.

column2: glancing at my watch again as I did so. Three thirty-three.
